theme_support.label: Theme Support
theme_support.description: Register theme support for various features.

allowed_origins.label: Allowed Origins
allowed_origins.description: Define site origins allowed to access this site.

disabled_admin_pages.label: Disable Admin Pages
disabled_admin_pages.description: Define admin pages to disable for users.

disabled_user_roles.label: Disable User Roles
disabled_user_roles.description: Define user_roles to disable for users.

disable_adminbar.label: Disable Adminbar on front-end
disable_adminbar.description: Removes admin bar from front-end and removes the option to enable it.

remove_wp_emojis.label: Remove wordpress "Emojicons" library
remove_wp_emojis.description: Removes emojicons js/css registers, improves front-end performance.

remove_oembed.label: Remove OEmbed Meta
remove_oembed.description: Removes the OEmbed meta from the front-end header meta, Prevents wordpress->wordpress smart embedding.

remove_api_meta.label: Remove JSON API Meta
remove_api_meta.description: Removes the API meta from the front-end, Caution: This can break certain plugins.

remove_wlwmanifest_link.label: Remove Windows Live Writer manifest file
remove_wlwmanifest_link.description: Removes the Windows Live Writer manifest file meta from the front-end header meta.

remove_rsd_link.label: Remove Really Simple Discovery service endpoint
remove_rsd_link.description: Removes the Really Simple Discovery service endpoint meta from the front-end header meta.

enable_debugger.label: Enable Debugger
enable_debugger.description: Enable PHP Debugger in DEV mode.
